p.s: The play Disgraced, Scene 4 was written by Ayad Akhtar in 2012 and then premiered in Chicago.
The play is set in Manhattan, New York and follows the young and successfullsuccessful lawyer Amir.
Even though his life seems perfect from the outside, during the play ugly truths get revealed and we get a look behind the fassade he built up.
Scene four is the last scene of the play.
The climax has already happened in scene three and this scene takes place six months later.
Amir's nephew Abe and his ex-wife Emily came to visit Amir in his apartment, because Abe has got a problem and is coming for Amir, a lawyer, for help.
Abe got treated very racist at Starbucks a few days ago, and because his immigration status is running out and up for renewal he got into big trouble with the FBIFederal Bureau of Investigation.
Amir immediately calls Ken, aan co-worker of his, to ask him for help on the case.
Ken also helped on a case that was brought up earlier in scene two and three.
Abe is really mad about the whole situation and confronts Amir about him still oppressing his religion and heritage and still thinking, he got a better life here in America.
From Abe's point of view, they just should have stayed in Pakistan.
